com.twilio4j.twism

Interface TwilioStateMachineServlet.TwilioHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    TwilioStateMachineServlet<E extends java.lang.Enum<?>>

    public static interface TwilioStateMachineServlet.TwilioHandler

    A TwilioHandler is used execute some java code and return TwiML. You are passed the TwilioParameters object, giving you access to userParams, which can be modified and its state will be preserved in a cookie to Twilio for the duration of the current phone call.

    Author:
    broc.seib@gentomi.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TwiML getTwiML(TwilioParameters params)
      getTwiML() is called by the state machine driver to advance the state of the state machine.

    • Method Detail

      • getTwiML

        TwiML getTwiML(TwilioParameters params)
        getTwiML() is called by the state machine driver to advance the state of the state machine. You have the opportunity to execute some java code, examine state information that you set yourself in the userParams (of the TwilioParams), or examine parameters passed from Twilio fromthe previous state, or even access the raw HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse if really needed. You can also modify the userParams hash map and your changes will be saved in an outbound cookie to Twilio.
        Parameters:
        params - You are passed the TwilioParameters object, giving you access to userParams, which can be modified and its state will be preserved in a cookie to Twilio for the duration of the current phone call.
        Returns:
        This block of code should return a TwiML document for the phone call to consume next.
